images.description: A simplified outline of a house in green lines with lighter green accents on the door and windows, representing the company's focus on construction.
images.suggested_usage: Use as the primary company logo in headers and footers.

images.description: A wide shot of a renovated mountain house with a dark gabled roof and light-colored walls, surrounded by green grass and a forest in the background, showcasing a completed construction project.
images.suggested_usage: Feature image for a completed project case study or a 'Reference' section.

images.description: A modern two-story house with a dark tile roof and light-colored facade, with two cars parked on the street in front of it, reflecting recent renovation work.
images.suggested_usage: Display in a project gallery, services section, or as a supporting visual for renovation services.
